issue.message: The Google Play store has a policy that limits usage of MANAGE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `capitalize(Locale)` instead. For strings meant to be internal use `Locale.ROOT`, otherwise `Locale.getDefault()`.
Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `capitalize(Locale)` instead. For strings meant to be internal use `Locale.ROOT`, otherwise `Locale.getDefault()`.
This view is not constrained. It only has designtime positions, so it will jump to (0,0) at runtime unless you add the constraints
Call requires API level 33 (current min is 30): `java.io.InputStream#readAllBytes`
Call requires API level 33 (current min is 30): `java.io.InputStream#readAllBytes`
Not targeting the latest versions of Android; compatibility modes apply. Consider testing and updating this version. Consult the `android.os.Build.VERSION_CODES` javadoc for details.

To get local formatting use `getDateInstance()`, `getDateTimeInstance()`, or `getTimeInstance()`, or use `new SimpleDateFormat(String template, Locale locale)` with for example `Locale.US` for ASCII dates.
Limit vector icons sizes to 200×200 to keep icon drawing fast; see https://developer.android.com/studio/write/vector-asset-studio#when for more
Limit vector icons sizes to 200×200 to keep icon drawing fast; see https://developer.android.com/studio/write/vector-asset-studio#when for more
